organization.fullName: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

identificationModule.briefTitle: Improving Neuroprotective Strategy for Ischemic Stroke With Sufficient Recanalization After Thrombectomy by Edaravone Dexborneol
identificationModule.officialTitle: Improving Neuroprotective Strategy for Ischemic Stroke With Sufficient Recanalization After Thrombectomy by Edaravone Dexborneol (INSIST-ED): a Prospective, Randomized, Double Blinded, Multi-centre Study

responsibleParty.investigatorAffiliation: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

descriptionModule.briefSummary: To explore the safety and efficacy of edaravone dexborneol for the treatment of acute ischemic stroke patients who received endovascular thrombectomy.

armGroups.label: 0.9% NaCl
armGroups.description: Intravenous injections of 0.9% NaCl BID for 12 ±2days.

armGroups.label: Edaravone Dexborneol
armGroups.description: Intravenous injections of edaravone dexborneol (37.5mg in 0·9% NaCl) BID for 12 ±2days.

interventions.name: edaravone dexborneol
interventions.description: Intravenous injections of edaravone dexborneol (37.5mg, dissolved in 100ml saline) twice a day for 12 ±2 days.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2
primaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 2

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
secondaryOutcomes.description: Proportion of patients with modified Rankin Score 0 to 1
Distribution of modified Rankin Score after the treatment

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Changes in National Institute of Health stroke scale (NIHSS)
secondaryOutcomes.description: the minimum and maximum values of NIHSS are 42 and 0, respectively; higher NIHSS mean a worse outcome
infarct volume is determinted by CT or DWI

otherOutcomes.description: sICH was defined as 4 or more increase in NIHSS caused by hemorrhage

otherOutcomes.measure: Proportion of intraparenchymal hemorrhage (PH1 and PH2)
otherOutcomes.description: Proportion of PH1 and PH2 within 48 hours after the treatment

locations.facility: General Hospital of Northern Theater Command
